title: What's your favourite rounded typeface?
content:
I like Ketchupa, although its not that rounded...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222124im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/firm_6700.jpg)

Luke.

 [‹ Goudy Oldstyle: Adobe vs. LTC](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222124/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37970 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pairing: Avantgarde Gothic (Book and Light) with ... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222124/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37950 "Go to next forum topic")
author: TDF

comments.content: didn’t we have this discussion once before... ?
Rounded? I thought I was wearing the wrong glasses.
I’m thinking twice, at least. But I don’t mind spreading the love for Omnes again. ;^)

Frankfurter.  
And the font is nice too.

[Ketchupa](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222124/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/ketchupa.asp)’s a favorite of mine, too.

I’m also partial to [Frankfurter Highlight](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222124/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frankfurter/highlight/)...

...and [VAG Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222124/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vag-rounded/)...

...and Haley Feige’s [Teaspoon](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222124/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33859)!

Thanks everyone!

Omnes fits the bill perfectly!

Sauna is also quite lovely...
I think from now on I’ll only design rounded typefaces.
